Class ScenariosBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.isangeles.senlin.data.ScenariosBase

  • public class ScenariosBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Static base for game scenarios
    Author:
    Isangles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Scenario getScenario(java.lang.String id)
      Returns scenario with specified ID
      static void load(java.lang.String areaPath, org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
      Loads base with scenarios for active module Note that now scenarios are only loaded dynamically on getScenario call(to shorten game load time)
